subject: Team Building Workshop - August 15th
body:
Hi Alex,

I hope this email finds you well. I'm reaching out to confirm your attendance at our upcoming team building workshop scheduled for August 15th from 2:00 PM to 5:00 PM in Conference Room B.

The workshop will focus on improving cross-departmental collaboration and communication skills. Please let me know by August 8th if you'll be attending so we can finalize catering arrangements.

Looking forward to your participation!

Best regards,
Sarah
